verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

This \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add shall be\add* unto you the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w* of \w months|strong="H2320"\w*: it \add shall be\add* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* to you.

¶ \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* ye unto all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, In the \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \add day\add* of this \w month|strong="H2320"\w* they shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* to them every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* a \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*, according to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \add their\add* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, a \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w* for an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:\f + \fr 12.3 \ft lamb: or, kid\f*

And if the \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* too \w little|strong="H4591"\w* for the \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*, let him and his \w neighbour|strong="H7934"\w* \w next|strong="H7138"\w* unto his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add* according to the \w number|strong="H4373"\w* of the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*; every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to his \w eating|strong="H0400"\w* shall make your \w count|strong="H3699"\w* for the \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*.

Your \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w* shall be without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, a \w male|strong="H2145"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: ye shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add* out from the \w sheep|strong="H3532"\w*, or from the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*:\f + \fr 12.5 \ft of…: Heb. son of a year\f*

And ye shall \w keep|strong="H4931"\w* it up until the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the same \w month|strong="H2320"\w*: and the \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* it \w in|strong="H0996"\w* the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.\f + \fr 12.6 \ft in…: Heb. between the two evenings\f*

And they shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w strike|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* on the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* side \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* and on the upper door \w post|strong="H4947"\w* of the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, wherein they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it.

And they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in that \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w roast|strong="H6748"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*; \add and\add* with \w bitter|strong="H4844"\w* \add herbs\add* they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it.

\w Eat|strong="H0398"\w* not of it \w raw|strong="H4995"\w*, nor \w sodden|strong="H1310"\w* at all with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, but \w roast|strong="H6748"\w* \add with\add* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* with his \w legs|strong="H3767"\w*, and with the \w purtenance|strong="H7130"\w* thereof.

And ye shall let nothing of it \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*; and that which \w remaineth|strong="H3498"\w* of it until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* ye shall \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

¶ And \w thus|strong="H3602"\w* shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it; \add with\add* your \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w*, your \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w* on your \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and your \w staff|strong="H4731"\w* in your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it in \w haste|strong="H2649"\w*: it \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*.

For I will \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* this \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, both \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*; and against all the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* I will \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H8201"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 12.12 \ft gods: or, princes\f*

And the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall be to you for a \w token|strong="H0226"\w* upon the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* where ye \add are:\add* and when I \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, I will \w pass|strong="H6452"\w* over you, and the \w plague|strong="H5063"\w* shall not be upon you to \w destroy|strong="H4889"\w* \add you\add*, when I \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 12.13 \ft to destroy…: Heb. for a destruction\f*

And this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall be unto you for a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w*; and ye shall \w keep|strong="H2287"\w* it a \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*; ye shall keep it a \w feast|strong="H2287"\w* by an \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*; \w even|strong="H0389"\w* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall put \w away|strong="H7673"\w* \w leaven|strong="H7603"\w* out of your \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*: for whosoever \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* leavened \w bread|strong="H2557"\w* from the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* until the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* off from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add there shall be\add* an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*, and in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* there shall be an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w* to you; no manner of \w work|strong="H4399"\w* shall be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in them, \w save|strong="H0389"\w* \add that\add* which every \w man|strong="H5315"\w* must \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, that only may be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* of you.\f + \fr 12.16 \ft man: Heb. soul\f*

And ye shall \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* \add the feast of\add* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*; for in this \w selfsame|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* have I \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* your \w armies|strong="H6635"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: therefore shall ye \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* by an \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ In the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \add month\add*, on the \w fourteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, until the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall there be no \w leaven|strong="H7603"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in your \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*: for whosoever \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* that which is \w leavened|strong="H2556"\w*, even that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whether he be a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, or \w born|strong="H0249"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
Ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* nothing \w leavened|strong="H2556"\w*; in all your \w habitations|strong="H4186"\w* shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*.

¶ Then \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Draw \w out|strong="H4900"\w* and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* you a \w lamb|strong="H6629"\w* according to your \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, and \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*.\f + \fr 12.21 \ft lamb: or, kid\f*

And ye shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w bunch|strong="H0092"\w* of \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w*, and \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* \add it\add* in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w bason|strong="H5592"\w*, and \w strike|strong="H5060"\w* the \w lintel|strong="H4947"\w* and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* side \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w bason|strong="H5592"\w*; and \w none|strong="H0376"\w* of you shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* to \w smite|strong="H5062"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*; and when he \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w lintel|strong="H4947"\w*, and on the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* side \w posts|strong="H4201"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will pass \w over|strong="H6452"\w* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, and will not \w suffer|strong="H5414"\w* the \w destroyer|strong="H7843"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* in unto your \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* to \w smite|strong="H5062"\w* \add you\add*.

And ye shall \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* for an \w ordinance|strong="H2706"\w* to thee and to thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, when ye be \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you, according as he hath \w promised|strong="H1696"\w*, that ye shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* this \w service|strong="H5656"\w*.
And it shall come to pass, when your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, What mean ye by this \w service|strong="H5656"\w*?

That ye shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, It \add is\add* the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*, who \w passed|strong="H6452"\w* over the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, when he \w smote|strong="H5062"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* our \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* bowed the \w head|strong="H6915"\w* and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w away|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* they.

¶ And it came to pass, that at \w midnight|strong="H2677"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* that \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* on his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* unto the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of the \w captive|strong="H7628"\w* that \add was\add* in the \w dungeon|strong="H1004"\w*; and all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*.\f + \fr 12.29 \ft dungeon: Heb. house of the pit\f*

And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, he, and all his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and all the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*; and there was a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; for \add there was\add* not a \w house|strong="H1004"\w* where \add there was\add* not one \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \add and\add* get you \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, both ye and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as ye have \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

Also \w take|strong="H3947"\w* your \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* and your \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*, as ye have \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, and be \w gone|strong="H3212"\w*; and \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* me also.

And the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* were \w urgent|strong="H2388"\w* upon the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that they might \w send|strong="H7971"\w* them out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* in \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*; for they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We \add be\add* all \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \add men\add*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* their \w dough|strong="H1217"\w* before it was \w leavened|strong="H2556"\w*, their \w kneadingtroughs|strong="H4863"\w* being bound \w up|strong="H6887"\w* in their \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w* upon their \w shoulders|strong="H7926"\w*.\f + \fr 12.34 \ft kneadingtroughs: or, dough\f*

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*; and they \w borrowed|strong="H7592"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w raiment|strong="H8071"\w*:

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, so that they \w lent|strong="H7592"\w* unto them \add such things as they required\add*. And they \w spoiled|strong="H5337"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* from \w Rameses|strong="H7486"\w* to \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*, about \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* on \w foot|strong="H7273"\w* \add that were\add* \w men|strong="H1397"\w*, \w beside|strong="H0905"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*.

And a \w mixed|strong="H6154"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7227"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* also with them; and \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, and \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*, \add even\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H3515"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*.\f + \fr 12.38 \ft a mixed…: Heb. a great mixture\f*

And they \w baked|strong="H0644"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w cakes|strong="H5692"\w* of the \w dough|strong="H1217"\w* which they brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, for it was not \w leavened|strong="H2556"\w*; because they were thrust \w out|strong="H1644"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w tarry|strong="H4102"\w*, neither had they \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* for themselves any \w victual|strong="H6720"\w*.

¶ Now the \w sojourning|strong="H4186"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, who \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \add was\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And it came to pass at the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, even the \w selfsame|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* it came to pass, that all the \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

It \add is\add* a \w night|strong="H3915"\w* to be much \w observed|strong="H8107"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* for \w bringing|strong="H3318"\w* them out from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: this \add is\add* that \w night|strong="H3915"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to be \w observed|strong="H8107"\w* of all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in their \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.  +  r 12.42  t a night…: Heb. a night of observations *

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* of the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*: There shall no \w stranger|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof:

But every \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* that is \w bought|strong="H4736"\w* for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, when thou hast \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w* him, then shall he \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof.
A \w foreigner|strong="H8453"\w* and an hired \w servant|strong="H7916"\w* shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof.

In \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall it be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*; thou shalt not carry \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* ought of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w* out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; neither shall ye \w break|strong="H7665"\w* a \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* thereof.
All the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* it.\f + \fr 12.47 \ft keep…: Heb. do it\f*

And when a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* shall \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* with thee, and will \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, let all his \w males|strong="H2145"\w* be \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w*, and then let him come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* and \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* it; and he shall be as one that is \w born|strong="H0249"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for no uncircumcised \w person|strong="H6189"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof.

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* shall be to him that is \w homeborn|strong="H0249"\w*, and unto the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you.

Thus \w did|strong="H6213"\w* all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* they.

And it came to pass the \w selfsame|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* did \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* by their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*.
